title: Bajaj Finance bucks industry trend, cuts deposit rates by 20 basis points in its top slab
description: The finance company will offer 8.40% a year from July 16 against 8.60% now for 42 months' maturity, people familiar with the matter said. Senior citizens will get 8.65% against 8.85% currently. There will be no change in other maturity slabs.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
